description:
In order to build the technical infrastructure necessary to stream high definition wide screen live video feeds of device bondage shows as well as shows that other Kink sites may wish to put on, we needed to test the system twice before it was ready. In a previous update, we showed you the second test. This bonus update is footage of the first test.
Sarah is bound on the floor with her legs spread, her arms pulled back and her nipples clamped tight and attached to the ground, pulling her forward in a grueling predicament bondage scenario.
title: Testing...Testing...
